document_data.name: Wandering Village
document_data.mainbody:
'''Wandering Village''' was a [[village]] in [[Icewind Dale]].

It was so-called because of the inhabitants' semi-nomadic hunter and gatherer lifestyle. The village was moved every spring to a new location.
